description.value:
You have a truly symbiotic relationship with the planet, and in return for your care and respect it grants you power. During your daily preparations, you choose a gift of the land from the options below. Your gift gives you training in martial weapons of that gift's preferred weapon groups, you are an expert in both preferred saving throws, and when dealing damage of that gift's preferred element, you deal 2 additional damage of that element.
